intro: There are plenty of things a person can be known for. Here are five Bible characters who were famous for their hair. Are you "brushed up" on this category?

questions.ask: What Bible strongman lost his power when his long hair was cut off?
What twin brother of Jacob was born hairy?
What son of David cut his long hair whenever it became too heavy for him?
What did the apostle Paul say that long hair is to a woman?
What does the "lover" in the Song of Songs twice compare his "beloved's" hair to?

intro: Now hear this... The Bible tells of many different sounds from heaven. What do you know about the five following?

questions.ask: What event in Jesus' life featured a voice from heaven saying, "This is my Son, whom I love"?
What sound from heaven accompanied God's work at Pentecost?
What musical instrument accompanied the song of victorious saints in heaven, according to John's Revelation?
What sound, according to the apostle Paul, causes every knee in heaven to bow?
What does the voice of the "living creature" resemble when the Lamb breaks the first seal on the seven-sealed book of Revelation?

intro: The "H" in quotation marks means every answer will start with that letter. And here's another hint: Each answer is a person's name...

questions.ask: What woman, the wife of Elkanah, was mother of the prophet Samuel?
What Old Testament prophet, at God's command, married an adulterous woman named Gomer?
What wicked New Testament king "was eaten by worms and died" for allowing people to call him a god?
What king of Tyre supplied cedar logs to Solomon for building the Lord's temple?
What prophetess told the faithful King Josiah he would not see the disaster God was bringing on his unfaithful nation?

intro: You'll note that the word "holy" is in quotation marks - so every answer will be a phrase featuring that word.

questions.ask: What did Jesus promise that God the Father would give to anyone who asked?
What did God tell Moses he was standing on when he approached the burning bush?
What did John call the new Jerusalem he saw in a vision, coming down out of heaven?
What did Paul tell Timothy that Christians should lift up in prayer?
What four-word phrase is used often in the book of Isaiah to describe the Lord?
